user.title: Set up Tibber Unofficial
user.description: Enter your Tibber account credentials to access Homevolt and EV Grid Rewards data.

homes.title: Select Home
homes.description: Choose which Tibber home to monitor for grid rewards.

data_description.home_id: Select the home to track rewards for

error.invalid_auth: Invalid email or password. Please check your Tibber account credentials.
error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to Tibber API. Please check your internet connection.
error.timeout: Connection timed out. Please try again.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again or check the logs.
error.no_homes: No homes found for this account. Please ensure your account has at least one home configured in the Tibber app.
error.invalid_home: The selected home is no longer available. Please select a different home.

abort.already_configured: This Tibber account is already configured.
abort.single_instance_allowed: Only one instance of Tibber Unofficial is allowed per home.

init.title: Update Intervals
init.description: Configure how often the integration fetches data from Tibber.

data_description.rewards_scan_interval: How often to check for updated reward data (5-1440 minutes)
data_description.gizmo_scan_interval: How often to discover new devices (1-168 hours)

auth_failed.title: Tibber Authentication Failed
auth_failed.description:
The Tibber Unofficial integration is unable to authenticate with your account. This may be due to changed credentials or an expired session.

Please update your credentials to restore functionality.

rate_limit_exceeded.title: Tibber API Rate Limit Exceeded
rate_limit_exceeded.description:
The integration is making too many requests to the Tibber API and has been rate limited. Consider increasing the update interval to reduce the frequency of requests.

Current interval: {current_interval} minutes
Recommended interval: {recommended_interval} minutes

deprecated_config.title: Deprecated Configuration Option
deprecated_config.description: The integration is using a deprecated configuration option {deprecated_option} which will be removed in a future version. Please use {new_option} instead.

refresh_rewards.name: Refresh Rewards Data
refresh_rewards.description: Immediately refresh grid rewards data for all sensors.

clear_cache.name: Clear API Cache
clear_cache.description: Clear the API response cache to force fresh data retrieval.
